Talk_3011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Aw, I'm real sorry. We're out of that.<sp:0:4:0>But we have lots of other goods harvested
from right here in Hateno Village, so take
your pick! It's all delicious!
Talk_3012:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Aw, I'm real sorry. Looks like I'm sold out.<sp:0:4:0>Well, we get fresh stock delivered daily
from around Hateno Village, so it won't
be long before they're full again!
Talk_1130: <sp:3:0:2:0800>You sure know how to spend 'em, friend!
Com_Talk_13:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0000><clr:ffff>You wanna sell that? How many
ya thinkin'?
Talk_3013:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Are ya headed on a trip somewhere
from here?<sp:0:4:0>If ya have travel plans, we recommend
not only a hearty meal before you go but
also some supplies to keep yourself safe!
Talk_3014:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Well, you've cleaned me out. If you're not
set to travel now, I guess you'll never be!
Com_Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Sorry, friend. Even I balk at buyin' a thing
like that.
Talk_3015:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Our li'l East Wind general store carries all
of <clr:0000>Hateno Village's local specialties<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Ever since <clr:0000>Cece <clr:ffff>set up shop in the place
across the way, Hateno has made a name
for itself with fresh fashion.<sp:0:4:0>Before that, though, this was a farming
community from way back.<sp:0:4:0>We're a self-sufficient li'l burg. We eat
what we harvest and sell the rest.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Ya know what you should try? The fresh
new dairy product from <clr:0000>Hateno Pasture<clr:ffff>,
<clr:0000>Hateno cheese<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0>We do stock it here, and I hope you'll
buy from us. But if that don't tickle your
fancy, the pasture offers <clr:0000>another way<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Head on up to the <clr:0000>pasture<clr:ffff>, and they'll
swap you a hunk of Hateno cheese for
a bottle of fresh milk.<sp:0:4:0>Between those <clr:0000>Cece-brand clothes<clr:ffff> and
<clr:0000>the new signature staples<clr:ffff>, this village has
been hoppin'!
Com_Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal>I'm not opposed to buyin' those clothes,
mind. What I'm havin' trouble with is that
you're still wearin' them.
Com_Talk_05b:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>I'm in no hurry. Curious to see what
you're selling!
Talk_2010:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>Friend, this is your lucky day! We just
started stocking Hateno cheese!<sp:0:4:0>The credit for this beauty doesn't belong
to only Hateno Pastureâ€”it's a <clr:0000>labor of
love from all of Hateno Village<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>We do stock it here, and I hope you'll
buy from us. But if that don't tickle your
fancy, the pasture offers <clr:0000>another way<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Head on up to the <clr:0000>pasture <clr:ffff>and they'll
swap you a hunk of Hateno cheese for
a bottle of fresh milk.<sp:0:4:0>Between those <clr:0000>Cece-brand clothes<clr:ffff> and
<clr:0000>the new signature staples<clr:ffff>, this village has
been hoppin'!
Com_Talk_05c: <sp:3:0:2:0101>No need to hurry. Take your time!
Talk_3000:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Here to pick up breakfast? Might I
recommend a bottle of <clr:0000>fresh milk<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0>It's delivered direct from <clr:0000>Hateno Pasture<clr:ffff>
up the hill!
Talk_2011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Friend, you chose the right day to pay
our store a visit!<sp:0:4:0>Why, we just began stocking <clr:0000>Hateno
Village<clr:ffff>'s original, genuine <clr:0000>sun pumpkins<clr:ffff>!<clr:0000><sp:0:4:0><clr:ffff>They're a masterpiece developed by our
mayor, Reede, and his farmer buddy Nack
through very careful breeding.<sp:0:4:0>Don't leave without one!
Com_Talk_05d: <sp:3:0:2:0101>Keep it comin', and I'll keep buyin'!
Talk_3001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Here to pick up lunch? Can I recommend
<clr:0000>Hylian rice<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0>It's top-notch grain, raised with loving
care by our own farmers!
Talk_3002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Here to pick up dinner? Can I recommend
a <clr:0000>bird egg<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0>We get ours straight from a local Cucco
farmer, as well as from the folks at
<clr:0000>Hateno Pasture<clr:ffff> up the hill!
Talk_1120: <sp:3:0:2:0800>If you need more, we'll restock soon!
Talk_3003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Here to pick up an evening snack?
Can I recommend a <clr:0000>Hylian tomato<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0>We just started stocking these, and the
folks around town can't get enough!
They're a Hateno Village specialty!
Talk_3004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Our li'l East Wind general store carries all
of <clr:0000>Hateno Village's local specialties<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Ever since <clr:0000>Cece <clr:ffff>set up shop in the place
across the way, Hateno has made a name
for itself with fresh fashion.<sp:0:4:0>Before that, though, this was a farming
community from way back.<sp:0:4:0>We're a self-sufficient li'l burg. We eat
what we harvest and sell the rest.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>I tell you what, you haven't lived until
you've tried a bottle of <clr:0000>fresh milk<clr:ffff> straight
from <clr:0000>Hateno Pasture<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Head on up to the <clr:0000>pasture<clr:ffff> when you get
a minute. You'll be glad you did.
Com_Talk_02c: <sp:3:0:2:0800>Got it! Anything else you wanna unload?
Com_Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>If you show me the right stuff, I'll pay you
the right price!
Com_Talk_02d:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thanks for your business! Say, is that all
you brought to sell?
Com_Talk_53:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think>Changed your mind? Well, I guess there's
nothing I can say to that.
Talk_3007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>Oh, this? <clr:0000>Cece <clr:ffff>made it. She's set up shop
in the place across the way.<sp:0:4:0>She left a long while back to practice
her craft, but she perfected it and came
back as a famous fashion designer.<sp:0:4:0>Now, <clr:0000>Cece fever<clr:ffff> is sweeping the village.
You can't throw a rock without hitting
someone wearing this hat.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00><sp:0:2:2:5000>I don't know the first thing about fashion myself.
My wife, Amira, cares much more about that stuff.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Com_Talk_54:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>Wait a tick... You don't have the rupees
to cover that!
Talk_3008:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Still curious about that hat? <clr:0000>Cece <clr:ffff>made it.
She's set up shop in the place across
the way.<sp:0:4:0>She left a long while back to practice
her craft, but she perfected it and came
back as a famous fashion designer.<sp:0:4:0>Now, <clr:0000>Cece fever<clr:ffff> is sweeping the village.
You can't throw a rock without hitting
someone wearing this hat.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00><sp:0:2:2:5000>I don't know the first thing about fashion myself.
My wife, Amira, cares much more about that stuff.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Com_Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal>Huh? You're already carrying a heavy
load, friend. If you feel like lightening it,
I'll buy some of it off ya.
Talk_3009:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>That wraps up the sales pitch, I figure.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>Sorry for the song and dance, but I got
a business to run. Anyhoo, you were
sayin'? Something I can do ya for?
Talk_1140: <sp:3:0:2:0800>I'd call that a win-win deal, friend!
Talk_2000:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The veggies out in the field aren't for
sale. If you're in the market for produce,
come see us!
